entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful Muggle relatives who live in Little Whinging.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story, a young wizard who lives with his Muggle relatives, the Dursleys.

entities.name: kitchen
entities.description: The kitchen is a location in the house where Harry hears voices and people moving around.

entities.name: bedroom
entities.description: Harry's bedroom is where he initially stays when he hears noises coming from downstairs.

relationships.description: The Dursleys are Harry's family, but they treat him poorly and neglect his magical heritage.
Harry moves from his bedroom to the kitchen in response to hearing voices and people moving around.
Harry initially stays in his bedroom when he hears noises coming from downstairs.
